Have you ever heard the phrase, "If the shoe fits wear it?"
The expression "If the shoe fits wear it..."
...is used to tell someone to accept a criticism that another person has made.
For example, "My mom just said I'm lazy and should get out and exercise more."
Well, if the shoe fits wear it, I suppose.
In other words, if something applies to you, accept it.
